definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes lying in a manger.
sentences.chinese: 你要去尋找一個包在襁褓裏，躺在馬槽內的嬰兒。

sentences.english: Outside in Manger Square, the atmosphere was festive.
sentences.chinese: 在教堂外面的馬槽廣場上到處洋溢着節日氣氛。

sentences.english: The Friars , daily celebrate the Eucharist at the Manger and at noon perform a procession around the Holy Places.
sentences.chinese: 修士們每天在馬槽慶祝感恩祭而夜裏在聖地遊行。

sentences.english: Or, buy one creche piece every year and write the date on the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 或者，每年購買一個託兒所馬槽並在其底部寫上日期。

definition: Great stone bridge or Dashiqiao county level city in Yingkou 營口|营口, Liaoning
to bare fangs and brandish claws (idiom); to make threatening gestures
the Emperor's body/Jesus' body/communion wafer (in Christian mass)
all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
